comment.author: 8110957@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Thoroughbred Horse Racing, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: It's Maher in the written caption, not Mahler. Daniel Aloysius Maher (1881-1916) was an American jockey who worked in the UK from 1908-1913, before he died at age 35 from tuberculosis. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daniel_A._Maher

comment.author: 8110957@N08
comment._content: See also this cigarette card of the era: www.flickr.com/photos/mando_gal/3346568005/

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: pennylrichardsca and mando maniac: Thanks for catching the typo and supplying the additional biographical information and image!  We'll fix the spelling and add some information when we update the record.
